    FunctionZeros

    Zeros of the Bessel J function

    Linux, OSX: &nbsp; Windows: &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;

    This module provides a function to compute the zeros of the Bessel J function.

    besselj_zero(nu, n)

    besselj_zero(nu, n)

    Return the nth zero of the the Bessel J function of order nu. The returned type has the same type as nu.

    FunctionZeros.besseljzeroasymptotic(nu, n)

    Asymptotic formula for the nth zero fo the the Bessel J function of order nu.

    besselj_zero_asymptotic(nu, n)
